PHRASE.LANG: This is the heart of every robot, by that we mean its battery supply. [#Legal]
Voici le cœur de tout robot, autrement dit, là où se trouve sa batterie. [#Legal]
Dies ist das Herz jedes Roboters. Das heißt: Seine Batterie. [#Legal]
Il cuore di ogni robot. Inteso come la sua batteria. [#Legal]
Este es el corazón de todo robot, es decir, su batería. [#Legal]
This is the heart of every robot, by that we mean its battery supply. [#Legal]
